actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
    r.report_id,
		r.report_number,
		r.report_type,
    r.insertion_date,
    r.sent_date,
    r.report_en_doc,
    r.report_en_pdf,
    r.report_sa_doc,
    r.report_sa_pdf
FROM
    reports r, violations_sites_main v
WHERE
    r.case_id_min <= {{CaseSelect.selectedOptionValue}} AND
    r.case_id_max >= {{CaseSelect.selectedOptionValue}} AND 
		v.entry_id = {{CaseSelect.selectedOptionValue}}
